name: Baby Cheramy Head To Toe Baby Wash Bed Time
short_description: Bed Time Head to Toe Baby Wash
description: Prepare your baby for a restful sleep with mild, tearless Baby Cheramy Head to Toe Baby Wash, enriched with a calming lavender fragrance. It gently cleanses the baby from head to toe, helping to retain moisture, leaving Baby’s skin soft and moisturized whilst helping to calm your little one to fall asleep faster. *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
